Posts.Content: Maya866 wrote: hello everyone am just gonna put my story out there am really happy I found this group to talk to and get the support thanks for reading 3 months ago I got this swollen lymph node in my right groin area huge went to the doctor checked asked me questions about my health and to my surprise the 2 months ago I was 151 and now am 128 and didn't even know it I was not on diet or gym but my apitit is not the same like before so he asked me if I had mammagram done before I said no and wanted me to do some blood test including pap and hiv test even though I was sure i have nothing I wasn't feeling sick or cold or anything but tired fatigue so we did the testing all came back negative normal then he scheduled me mammagram when he told me that I went home and started feeling my breasts to see what is he talking about and there it was a lump called the doctor told him and they did find it on the ultrasound so now I also got a swollen jaw lymph node on also the right now I have swollen groin area jaw area and breast tumor all on the right he didn't know what it is but my ultrasound was abnormal so he referred me to oncologist and still waiting for my appointment while waiting I can feel another huge lump on the same breast I thought this is weird let me feel my other breast but my left breast feels sold lumpy but soft lumps and the right one feels hard and I can feel the tumor the doctor found and the knew lump I found now I don't know what to do should I just wait for my appointment it's next week or should I call my doctor he did want me to do a biopsy but we haven't got to that part yet of the process I am really scared I don't know what to expect all my lymph nodes don't hurts and my breast doesn't hurt sometime I feel sapping pain and it goes away I also have a lot of pack pain and numbness on my right arm and right leg Also what's very starage my period was late for 2 months am not pregnant and when I got it it was so painful I had to take 5 advils for the pain to go away and never had painful period but only had it for 2 days and I still have a lot of white discharge no smell no itch as I told u I did testing down there I have no kind of infection please help I don't wanna tell all these things to my doctor I feel his gonna think am crazy but all these symptoms have been having and still happening please help and thank you so much for giving the time to read my story will update once I see the oncologist and do a biopsy Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed yet but very worried Maya866 Maya866

Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2016 06:55PM Maya866 wrote: I did go back to my doctor he doesn't want me to stop because he feels this is serious but he can't really dof anything but refer me his just a family doctor at the oncologist I felt like am talking for nothing and at the end he was concerned about me vomiting but not the breast lump or any other symptoms maybe because I have medicaid thathe it's not first class health care am sure if I pay cash or private insurance ito would be better
